Output Modules.​PIT_MAIL.​MAIL_NTLM

Package to allow to authenticate to a NTLM SMTP server

Disclaimer

This package is a PL/SQL port from the Ntml.java, distributed under GNU General Public License Version 2 only ("GPL") or the Common Development and Distribution License("CDDL") 1.0.  Ntlm.java is part of javamail, available at http://​kenai​.com​/projects​/javamail Authors: Michael McMahon and Bill Shannon Port made by Javier Martin-Ortega, under GPL v2

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Functions
authenticate
procedure authenticate(
p_conn in out nocopy utl_smtp.connection,
p_host in varchar2,
p_user_name in varchar2,
p_password in varchar2
)

Method to authenticate with a NTLM smtp server like Exchange  with the credentials provided and return the connection via <P_CONN>.

Parameters
p_conn
in out nocopy utl_smtp.connection

Parameter for the actual smtp-connection

p_host
in varchar2

Name of the ntlm-server, including domain

p_user_name
in varchar2

Name of the user to authenticate

p_password
in varchar2

Authentication users password
